title: to (c) of that subsection as they relate to the body to which the following order
heading: 1. (1) This Order may be cited as the Civil Law and Criminal Law
text_raw:
1. (1) This Order may be cited as the Civil Law and Criminal Law 
(Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 2020 (Section 31) (Central Bank of Ireland) 
(Designation) Order 2020. 

(2) The Central Bank of Ireland is, for the purposes of section 31 of the 
Civil Law and Criminal Law (Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 2020 (No. 13 of 
2020), designated and may hold hearings before it by remote hearing. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

5 October, 2020. 

PASCHAL DONOHOE, 
Minister for Finance. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 13th October, 2020. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [422] 3 

BAILE ÁTHA CLIATH 
ARNA FHOILSIÚ AG OIFIG AN tSOLÁTHAIR
